title: Perfect
description: A romantic ballad by Ed Sheeran from his third studio album รท (2017).

title: Blinding Lights
description: A hit single by The Weeknd, released in 2019, known for its 80s synthwave vibe.

title: Levitating
description: A disco-pop track by Dua Lipa from her 2020 album Future Nostalgia.

title: Shape of You
description: One of the best-selling singles of all time by Ed Sheeran, blending pop and dancehall.

title: Stay
description: A collaboration between The Kid LAROI and Justin Bieber, released in 2021.
